description_for_human: Query and export data from Oracle database
description_for_model: Use this tool to query the TEST_CDC table and export data to CSV from an Oracle database. The query_test_cdc command will show the first 10 rows, and export_to_csv will save them to a file.

query_test_cdc.description: Fetch the first 10 rows from TEST_CDC table

export_to_csv.description: Export the first 10 rows from TEST_CDC table to a CSV file
